name: Night Realm's Gift: Repaid in Full
description: When your Kinich, who has this equipped, switches to become your active character or uses Canopy Hunter: Riding High: If you have the same amount or fewer cards in your Hand than your opponent, steal 1 card from their Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, after which your opponent draws 1 card. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1709]</color>, who has this equipped, switches to become your active character or uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S17092]</color>: If you have the same amount or fewer cards in your Hand than your opponent, steal 1 card from their Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, after which your opponent draws 1 card. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kinich</color>, who has this equipped, switches to become your active character or uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color>: If you have the same amount or fewer cards in your Hand than your opponent, steal 1 card from their Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost, after which your opponent draws 1 card. (Once per Round)
